entry.title: Bitcoin Legal Defense Fund
entry.summary: The discussion on the bitcoin-dev mailing list revolves around suggestions for the name of a fund that would finance defense lawsuits related to bitcoin. Some participants suggest a more neutral name, potentially covering other cryptocurrencies than just bitcoin, and referring to Satoshi's paper where everything started. There is also a concern about the fund financing lawsuits irrelevant to bitcoin. Another suggestion is to prevent people involved in such important funds from commenting or influencing soft fork-related discussions. The board operating principles will likely include criteria for how cases are chosen to protect against this board and fund influencing direction. Overall, the discussion seeks to ensure that the fund operates in a transparent and responsible manner.
